description: Sends a message to a queue.

properties.name: queuename
properties.label: Queue Name
properties.description: Provide the name the queue to connect this output to.

properties.name: autocreate
properties.label: Auto Create
properties.description: Automatically creates the queue if it doesn't exists yet.

properties.name: persistent
properties.label: Send Persistent
properties.description: Marks each message sent through this output as persistent.
